resources.string:
What is STAMINA mode?" STAMINA mode is a Sony™ power save function. It extends battery lifetime by disabling functionality while the screen is off.
"Basic usage" To activate STAMINA mode, use the switch on the next screen. When the screen is off, all network data will be disabled temporarily, and most of your applications will be inactive, to save battery. When the screen is on, your device will function normally.
"Advanced usage" If you want to keep some apps active when the screen is off, just add them to the APPS ACTIVE IN STANDBY list.
"Note" Some applications may not work properly when disabled in standby. If an application does not work properly, add it to the APPS ACTIVE IN STANDBY list, or if this does not work, deactivate STAMINA mode."
Low-battery mode

"With the current exchange settings you are required to encrypt the SD card to be able to access it.
Encryption of the SD card may take several hours depending on the storage capacity.
Encrypt now?"

"Encryption of the SD card was interrupted and cannot be completed. As a result, the data on your SD card is no longer accessible.
You need to format your SD card in order to access the data again."

"Any changes you make to your accounts on the web will automatically be copied to your phone.
Some accounts may also automatically copy any changes you make on the phone to the web.
To select what type of information to sync within each account, go to Settings > Accounts.
Data transmission charges may apply when updates are made to your phone."

Require a numeric PIN or password to decrypt your phone each time you power it on

"This will encrypt your personal data such as accounts, settings and downloaded apps. Once you encrypt your device, you must enter a numeric PIN or password to decrypt it each time you turn it on.
Encryption may take several hours depending on the storage capacity of the device. You must start with a charged battery and keep your device plugged in until encryption is complete. During this process the device will restart several times. If you interrupt the encryption process, you will lose some or all of your data. "
Plug in your charger and try again.
You must set a lock screen PIN or password before you can start encryption.

%1$s will be able to read all notifications posted by the system or any installed app, which may include personal information such as contact names and the text of messages sent to you. It will also be able to dismiss these notifications or touch action buttons within them.

"When this feature is turned on, you can beam app content to another NFC-capable device by holding the devices close together. For example, you can beam Browser pages, YouTube videos, People contacts and more.
Just bring the devices together (typically back to back) and then touch your screen. The app determines what gets beamed."

"When this feature is turned on, you can zoom in and out by triple-tapping the screen.
While zoomed in, you can:
"
"Pan: Drag two or more fingers across the screen.
"
Adjust zoom level: Pinch two or more fingers together or spread them apart."
You can also temporarily magnify what's under your finger by triple-tapping and holding. In this magnified state, you can drag your finger to explore different parts of the screen. Lift your finger to return to your previous state.
Note: Triple-tap for magnification works everywhere except the keyboard and navigation bar."

"Any changes you make to your accounts on the web will be automatically copied to your phone.
Some accounts may also automatically copy any changes you make on your phone to the web.
To select what type of information to sync within each account, go to Settings > Accounts."

"Your mobile data connection will be disabled when the specified limit is reached.
As data usage is measured by your phone, and your carrier may account for usage differently, consider using a conservative limit."

This setting affects all users on this phone."

"You can share this device with other people by creating additional users. Each user has their own space, which they can customise with their own apps, wallpaper and so on. Users can also adjust tablet settings like Wi-Fi that affect everyone.
After you've created a new user, that person needs to go through a setup process.
Any user can accept updated app permissions on behalf of all other users."

"You can use your device as a Mobile Hotspot. This allows other devices (maximum 10) to connect to it via a Wi-Fi network. The connected devices will have access to the Internet via your phone’s mobile network connection. Mobile Hotspot uses mobile data and can result in additional charges.
Mobile Hotspot consumes more battery. Connect the device to an outlet to extend the battery life."
Getting started with Mobile Hotspot

Priority order adjustment

"The internal memory is already encrypted.
By turning encryption of the SD card on, new files and files that have been modified will be encrypted and will not be able to be read on other devices. Already existing files will remain unencrypted as long as they haven't been modified.
Note: It is not possible to turn SD card encryption off once it has been turned on."

"With the current Exchange settings, you are required to turn on encryption of the SD card to be able to access it.
Doing this will encrypt new files. Already existing files on the SD card will remain unencrypted until they have been modified.
Encrypt now?"

"Encryption of the SD card will prevent new files from being used on other devices. Unaltered files will still be accessible on other devices until they are modified. Please note that turning on SD card encryption is irreversible.
Note: This action cannot be reversed, except by performing a factory reset, erasing all of your data."

"Any changes you make to your accounts on the web will be automatically copied to your device.
Some accounts may also automatically copy any changes you make on your device to the web.
To select what type of information to sync within each account, go to Settings > Accounts.
Data transmission charges may apply when updates are made to your device. An unlimited data plan is recommended."
"Enable one or more functions in STAMINA mode to optimise battery time. "

"Activate reader mode for the applications that you want to use undisturbed. When you use an application in reader mode, no other applications are allowed to run. By using only one application at a time, you will also save power. "
Lets you use selected applications without being disturbed by notifications.
All encrypted files on an SD card will be unreadable on the device after a factory data reset.
Preferred data connection in roaming

Queuing background data optimises outgoing traffic when the screen is off by sending data at set intervals.
